MangaSeries.name: Exact Name of Manga Series
MangaSeries.HostSite: One of the following casesensitive (MangaFox, OtakuWorks, MangaReader)
MangaSeries.LastChapterDownloaded: Chapter Name The format is site Dependent. If the last chapter does not match any on the site the script will try to download all available chapters. If the node is not present, the script will download all of the available chapters. This field is updated by the script so that the next time the script runs only the newest chapters are retrieved.
MangaSeries.downloadPath: Path to save the downloaded chapters. If this node is not present, the script will create a download Directory name "./" + MANGA_NAME
